context.description: connects an SPL data flow graph to the Watson IoT Platform as an application that receives events from devices and sends commands to them

parameter.name: applicationCredentials
parameter.description: the name of a file containing Watson IoT Platform application credentials

parameter.name: eventData
parameter.description: an output attribute of type 'rstring' for data recieved with an event from a device via the Watson IoT Platform

parameter.name: eventDeviceId
parameter.description: optionally, an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the identifier of the device that sent the event received from the Watson IoT Platform, with no default

parameter.name: eventDeviceType
parameter.description: optionally, an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the type of the device that sent the event recieved via the Watson IoT Platform, with no default

parameter.name: eventFormat
parameter.description: optionally, an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the format of the data recieved with an event from a device via the Watson IoT Platform, with no default

parameter.name: eventName
parameter.description: an output attribute of type 'rstring' for the name of the event recieved from a device via the Watson IoT Platform

parameter.name: initDelay
parameter.description: Delay in seconds before the operator starts producing tuples.

parameter.name: subscriptionDeviceIds
parameter.description: output tuples will be produced from events received from these devices, defaulting to '+', meaning all devices

parameter.name: subscriptionDeviceTypes
parameter.description: output tuples will be produced from events received from these device types, defaulting to '+', meaning all device types

parameter.name: subscriptionEvents
parameter.description: output tuples will be produced from these events, defaulting to '+', meaning all events

parameter.name: subscriptionFormats
parameter.description: output tuples will be produced from events received in these formats, defaulting to '+', meaning all formats

outputPortSet.description: output port for tuples received as events from devices via the Watson IoT Platform
